color-no-hex.message: Use design tokens (var(--color-*)) instead of raw hex colors

declaration-no-important.message: Avoid !important declarations. Use CSS specificity and cascade layers instead

media-feature-name-no-unknown.message: Use custom media queries (--bp-*, --container-*) instead of raw breakpoint values

function-disallowed-list.message: Use design tokens (var(--color-*)) instead of color functions

custom-media-pattern.message: Custom media queries must follow the pattern --bp-* or --container-* (e.g., --bp-md, --container-lg)

selector-class-pattern.message: CSS Modules classes should use camelCase or BEM naming (e.g., .componentName, .componentName__element, .componentName--modifier)

property-no-vendor-prefix.message: Use autoprefixer instead of vendor prefixes

value-no-vendor-prefix.message: Use autoprefixer instead of vendor prefixes

at-rule-no-vendor-prefix.message: Use autoprefixer instead of vendor prefixes

selector-no-vendor-prefix.message: Use autoprefixer instead of vendor prefixes
